description: Returns a list of simulation applications. You can optionally provide filters to retrieve specific simulation applications.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional list of filters to limit results. The filter name name is supported. When filtering, you must use the complete value of the filtered item. You can use up to three filters. (dict) --- Information about a filter. name (string) --- The name of the filter. values (list) --- A list of values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: simulationApplicationSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of simulation application summaries that meet the criteria of the request.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the simulation application.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the simulation application was last updated.

nested_items.name: robotSoftwareSuite
nested_items.description: Information about a robot software suite.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the robot software suite. General is the only supported value.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the robot software suite. Not applicable for General software suite.

nested_items.name: simulationSoftwareSuite
nested_items.description: Information about a simulation software suite.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation software suite. SimulationRuntime is the only supported value.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the simulation software suite. Not applicable for SimulationRuntime.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous paginated request did not return all of the remaining results, the response object's nextToken parameter value is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListSimulationApplications again and assign that token to the request object's nextToken parameter. If there are no remaining results, the previous response object's NextToken parameter is set to null.
